name: Anubis Dungeon
description: The judge of the kingdom of the dead is the guide of the dead to the afterlife, but what if the living cheated death?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 600 MHz or higher processor Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics DirectX: Version 8.1 Sound Card: Integrated Audio
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 2.5 GHz (Single Core) / 2 GHz (Dual Core) Graphics: Video card with 1024 MB shared VRAM & openGL 2.0 support Sound Card: DirectX compatible
